name: The Sages - The Secret of the Magic Elixir

metadata.name: The Sages - The Secret of the Magic Elixir
metadata.description: In 2023, an esteemed band of Web3 Professionals and Disruptors have set out in the World to find worthy successors to their Legacy. They have generated 1,000 Magic Potions that will forever stay on the chain to provide Web3 Superpowers to 1,000 prodigies. The chosen ones will be entrusted with the secret of their Magic Elixir which will allow them to achieve Web3 Mass Adoption. Take good care of your Elixir and watch the Force within evolve.
